General.Name: Shenzhen SEG Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen SEG Co.,Ltd engages in the electronics market business in China. The company offers property management and urban services; inspection, testing, and certification services; and constructs and operates photovoltaic power station project. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Shenzhen, China. Shenzhen SEG Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Shenzhen SEG Group Co., Ltd.
